column1: ## set all prices to 1 aside for runes (inclusive)
## Twin Maidens Shop - Twig (6070/2/1) => Lost Ashes of War (10070/3/-1)
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10010 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param CharaInitParam: idrange 3000 3299 && positive HpEstMax  : HpEstMax: = 4
## set all starting classes to level 1 / 10 in every stat
## starting gift: Golden Seed (10010) / Sacred Tear (10020) => Golden Rune [10] - 5000
param CharaInitParam: id 2401: Name: = Gift - Golden Rune [10] - 5000
param CharaInitParam: id 2402: Name: = Gift - Golden Rune [10] - 5000
## remove all smithing stones from shops
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10101 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10105 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10107 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10140 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10160 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10164 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10165 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10167 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10168 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10900 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10903 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10906 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10908 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10909 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10910 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10913 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10916 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10918 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
param ShopLineupParam: prop equipId 10919 && positive sellQuantity: sellQuantity: = 0
## remove rune costs from weapon upgrades
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 65 69 && positive weight: weight: = 0
## lower equid load for any endurance by 15 (Val0 used to be same as Val1)
## give every weapon and shield 100% phys block and at least 35 guard boost
## lower weapon stat requirements (not for shields and catalysts)
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properStrength 10 19: properStrength: = 10
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properStrength 20 99: properStrength: = 20
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properAgility 10 19: properAgility: = 10
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properAgility 20 99: properAgility: = 20
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properMagic 10 19: properMagic: = 10
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properMagic 20 99: properMagic: = 20
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properFaith 10 19: properFaith: = 10
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properFaith 20 99: properFaith: = 20
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properLuck 10 19: properLuck: = 10
param EquipParamWeapon: !proprange wepType 57 69 && proprange properLuck 20 99: properLuck: = 20
## change arrow and bolt limits to 255
## buff guard of weapons with heavy attack block
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange staminaGuardDef 0 60: staminaGuardDef: = 60
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange physGuardCutRate 0 95: physGuardCutRate: = 95
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange magGuardCutRate 0 45: magGuardCutRate: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange fireGuardCutRate 0 45: fireGuardCutRate: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange thunGuardCutRate 0 45: thunGuardCutRate: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange darkGuardCutRate 0 45: darkGuardCutRate: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange poisonGuardResist 0 45: poisonGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange diseaseGuardResist 0 45: diseaseGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange bloodGuardResist 0 45: bloodGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange curseGuardResist 0 45: curseGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange freezeGuardResist 0 45: freezeGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange sleepGuardResist 0 45: sleepGuardResist: = 45
param EquipParamWeapon: prop spAtkcategory 113 && proprange madnessGuardResist 0 45: madnessGuardResist: = 45
